attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to get the Prime Minister Mr Tony Blair out of Number 10 as soon as possible. 

The are many reasons why Mr Blair must go and not just because of the Iraq War. 

He has pushed up tuition fees, which means that students like my slef have to pay more than what others did last year, putting up taxes AGAIN, putting prices up in the housing industry, retail and insurance industry which makes our lives a living hell as we do not earn as much as Mr Blair and his associates.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
